version_description:
Yo-ho-ho! Git ready for war, mate! This update brings Alliance Wars, a new exciting mode that pits Alliance vs Alliance in exciting 50-player pirate warfare.
Also, you can also now apply special boosts to new types of stats for your toons!
We have also added an advanced stats screen so you can check how boosts apply to your toons more conveniently.

Hey Doc! In this release, you'll find a number of improvements to make the game a bit more snappy for you. Some of the changes include the ability to tap to skip through reward animations, the removal of some non-essential animations, and optimizations that should reduce lag.

Yo-ho-ho! Welcome to the LT Holiday update, mate!

INTRODUCING
- Login Calendars! Collect rewards simply by logging in daily. A community-favorite
- New Maps for Alliance Wars! Play War in 3 new Maps. Just in time for War's first anniversary

IMPROVEMENTS
- You can now rotate toons in your collection. Weee
- Floating text no longer covers toons in battle and ""Critical!"" is back by popular demand"

"Updated and polished animations on:
Ninja Ralph: all attacks
Zoot Suit Daffy: all attacks
Lola Frostbane: Ancestral Axe, Northern Winds, Ragnarock
Baseball Bugs: Curveball, Grand Slam, Bases Loaded
Egghead Wizard: all attacks
Archon Elmer: Gravity Gauntlet, Planet Piercer
Sylvester Jr: Kitty Pounce, Oh Father, For Shame
Devil Dog: Brimstone Rift, Book of Darnation
Star-Pharaoh Marvin: God-King's Decree"

"Updated and polished animations on:
Ninja Ralph: all attacks
Zoot Suit Daffy: all attacks
Lola Frostbane: Ancestral Axe, Northern Winds, Ragnarock
Baseball Bugs: Curveball, Grand Slam, Bases Loaded
Egghead Wizard: all attacks
Archon Elmer: Gravity Gauntlet, Planet Piercer
Sylvester Jr: Kitty Pounce, Oh Father, For Shame
Devil Dog: Brimstone Rift, Book of Darnation
Star-Pharaoh Marvin: God-King's Decree"

"Updated and polished animations on:
Ninja Ralph: all attacks
Zoot Suit Daffy: all attacks
Lola Frostbane: Ancestral Axe, Northern Winds, Ragnarock
Baseball Bugs: Curveball, Grand Slam, Bases Loaded
Egghead Wizard: all attacks
Archon Elmer: Gravity Gauntlet, Planet Piercer
Sylvester Jr: Kitty Pounce, Oh Father, For Shame
Devil Dog: Brimstone Rift, Book of Darnation
Star-Pharaoh Marvin: God-King's Decree"

"The ACME corporation is shipping its wackiest Gadgets!

Gadgets are a new collectible item you can equip to any toon to unlock new utility in combat!
Explore infinite possibilities pairing the right Gadgets with the best toons and personalize your teams to play with your unique strategy!

- Collect 6 new ACME Gadgets from the ACME Campaign
- Equip Gadgets on your favorite toons
- Gain new abilities in combat by equiping full gadget sets!"

"Space Jam: A New Legacy is invading the World of Mayhem! Participate in the brand new Space Jam event and assemble your Toon Squad!

New with 30.0.1
- Behind the scenes changes to significantly reduce crashes and crashing frequency
- Frame rate improvements and performance optimizations for all devices
- Added ability to save teams with fewer than 4 members

Recently released:
- Save and discover powerful Looney Tunes teams with the new Save Teams feature!
- Deploy your teams faster by selecting between up to 15 teams you've previously saved"

IMPROVED
- Glance equipped Gadgets in your collection and team select screens
- Preview Gadgets equipped on your enemy's toons before you enter battle
- New recycle filters make it easier to recycle Gadgets of a specific set
- Move the slider to level up a Gadget multiple times at once
- New Login options: Facebook and Apple (iOS only). Easier account recovery and playing on both platforms

FIXED
- Multiple bugs around account disconnecting unexpectedly resulting in lost progress

Join us October 29th - November 11th for our Halloween event, Rise From the Grave! Receive a new toon, Mummy Ralph, free then begin your Trick-o-Treat, candy gathering quest to unlock our spookiest toon yet, Zombie Sam Sheepdog. Lot’s of daily prizes and activities for those who dare to join in this haunting season!
